tracks.title: Hated in the Nation
tracks.description: Dark ambient piano track, with a revolving mysterious futuristic synths and bright piano. Titled after the fantastic Black Mirror episode.

tracks.title: N E O N D R I V E
tracks.description: A lo-fi, mellow, dark piano track that would suit a silent film.

tracks.title: A Dirty Job
tracks.description: A lo-fi, mellow, dark piano track that would suit a silent film.

tracks.title: The Nightmare Revelation
tracks.description: This track is inspired by the music of Dirk Gently's Hollistic Detective Agency. The first part is glitchty, experimental and electronic, while the second is a wide rhythmic synth arpeggio sequence with overlaying bursts of piano.

tracks.title: Rise and Fall
tracks.description: An ambient string soundscape, reminiscent of an ethereal cosmos. Slowly building and moving from deep pauses to a final chord progression with a pleasant cadence

tracks.title: Polymagic
tracks.description: This track has an interesting rhythm and jazzy breaks in between. Although some samples and synths are used, the track maintains it's acoustic feel. The ending is a improvisational take on the Harry Potter theme

tracks.title: Memento Mori
tracks.description: Heavily sample based, this track blends raw orchestral instruments with synth samples. Flutes, clarinets, double bass, violins, and cello make short but meaningful appearances in this track. The percussion plays with irregularity, while the melodies are more rhythmic

tracks.title: Echoes Of A Lost City
tracks.description: A blend of piano, orchestral and electronic ambience. The repeating sequence builds up slowly to the final moment

tracks.title: Analog Cityman
tracks.description: An improv session with multiple analogue-like synths. This was all recorded in one take.
